name: LowPoly Crétins
description:
It is a free mini platformer game inspired by the characters of "The Lapins Crétins" from Ubisoft.

All the models are in low poly style and made with Blender.

The game has been created in Unreal Engine.

This is an early access game and therefore new levels with new sceneries will be added to this game. #adventure #arcade #fangame #platformer

Credits :

3D Assets design: Anthony Cardinale  http://www.anthony-cardinale.fr/

Music: HappyNES by Shane Ivers - https://www.silvermansound.com

Sounds from Rick Dangerous 8-Bits game (Core Design)
